thread.section_title: Home Zone Furniture Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Home Zone Furniture | homezonefurniture.com
thread.title: RS
thread.title_full: Home Zone Furniture reviewed by RS

author: RS
title: RS
text:
Went on a weekday to purchase a dining set, I was really happy that they actually had it on display ( was only online ) at the Lewisville store.
Staff memeber Gladys was helping through out my entire purchase. She was informative and non pushy about getting credit store or warranty. In the end I spent about 2 hr or more before I finalized my decision ( they had other great choices) and I appreciate Gladys for helping every step of the way!
